title: ISecondaryMemberUpToMembersFeatureData.RevDirectionDistanceMember
description: Gets or sets whether to flip the direction of the distance offset for this secondary structure system up-to member.
returns: True to flip the direction of the offset, false to not
remarks:
This property is valid only if
ISecondaryMemberUpToMembersFeatureData::SecondaryMemberOffsetType
is set to
swSecondaryMemberUpToMembersDistanceFromEndType_e
.swSecondaryMemberUpToMembersDistanceFromEndType_Distance.
